entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
